website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses the competition in quality, convenience, and performance. You won't find a better set with more to offer.
pros: A well-made, 20-piece set by a trusted brand
cons: Some owners of older Craftsman tools suggest they are slightly less rugged, but workmanship still leads the pack

customer_reviews.title: Lobster claw not a big deal fit and finish are still good.Made in china what isn,t these days
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people say these are crap ,but i,ll let you know these are no different from gearwrench as far as fit is concern ,made in china o.k so they have a little more material around the open end SO WHAT. They have a life time warranty so get over the whining.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: NOT NEW
customer_reviews.text: Update: 1 star to 4 Arrangements have been made to rectify my situation and I'm very pleased with the speed at which this has taken place. i got a box of loose tools that were obituary a return item. It honestly looks like all the bad tools from several sets were all out in one box and sold to me. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: N8 - Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: These are much better than expected. I would not use them in a heavy torque situation, likely to strip the ratchets. the ratchet end are not too oversized, though I have had the issue of clearance, but just used a socket instead. the 20 piece set is a good combination - I may by a few individuals or an oversized set, but I'm not sure I'll need to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're Craftsmans,  N'uff Said.
customer_reviews.text: Been in the market for years for geared box wrenches. Then I saw a decent variety set from a reputable brand for a good price. No complaints, no failures. Tools are an investment. These may stay in the "wrench wrap" I bought along with this set for years. But I'll have them when I need them. Plus they're Craftsmans. Which is a family tradition.
customer_reviews.author: Wizekracker

customer_reviews.title: Great wrenches
customer_reviews.text: Great ratcheting ends that should last forever if you don’t break bolts or torque down with the ratcheting end. Torque and break bolts with the box end. The only negative is there is no flip switch to change the ratcheting direction, you need to flip the wrench over to change ratcheting direction.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good quality
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars, but when it arrived the wrenches were scattered in the package instead of in their proper compartments. A little worried that the case will not keep them organized for me, but I received a full set and quality seems pretty good so I’ll be keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Strongrrl

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars for the wrenches. 1 Star for the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the wrenches. 1 star for the way it arrived. There wasn't an outter shipping box. Wrenches arrived in the craftsman box and the bottom was open. I'm absolutely amazed all the wrenches were in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great works better.
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman looks as good as it works. Have some tools over 25 years old and still working like new. These looks to be same great quality. They have stood up to some tough bolts and no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I have had Craftsman tools for 30 years. Good automotive tools for weekend auto jobs in the garage. This is my first set of ratcheting wrenchs. Love them. They get into hard to reach places where a socket wil not work.
customer_reviews.author: Edh

customer_reviews.title: Good price for 20 pcs.
customer_reviews.text: China. Whatever. It’s Craftsman. I might have had one mm that skipped a ball bearing rough on the ratchet. Whatever. 20 pieces: 60 bucks. I hit em with wd40 in a line from the get go for extra protection. I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great tools, had then over a year and they still look new and work like they just got out of the box. I kept them inside and cleaned then after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: After all these years, they are still Craftsman quality
customer_reviews.text: Lots of choices on line. Lots of names I was not familiar with. Then, I see my old favorite: Craftsman. They feel good in my hands. They work very well. I cannot attest to their durability, as I have only had them a month but if they are like the rest of my Craftsman tools in the past 40+ years, they will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joe E. Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great wrenches
customer_reviews.text: These are great wrenches at a great price. My only wish was that they came with some kind of storage. I bought red and black plastic things they hang in from another vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Johns

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love Craftsman and at a great price to boot. These ratchet wrenchs are well designed and tough. Craftsman chrome has always been good. Bought a Dickies roll up storage bag for them and they are ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: hammerCK

customer_reviews.title: i love this set
customer_reviews.text: i made a beautiful tool holder fot this whole set out of cedar with dowels. and they work just as good as they look
customer_reviews.author: keith h

customer_reviews.title: Buy them you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: What can I say they are Craftsman, I put a lot of pressure on the ratcheting side of the wrench and I didn't break it, these are sturdy and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqbly

customer_reviews.title: Wimpy Ratchet Wrench set!!!
customer_reviews.text: What the hell is happening to Craftman Tool Company. The first time I used these wrenches, I was sure I was going to bend the handle or strip the ratchet gear. They appear to be toys and not made for heavy duty mechanical work. They are rather painful to work with. I gave them to my son, to work on his bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Victor B.

customer_reviews.title: I miss sears
customer_reviews.text: Still use these after 2 years and I use them so much soo so so much. Worth every cent and durable for heavy mechanical use
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described!
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT 12 degree offset wrenches. The description is false.
customer_reviews.author: SPARTY 047

customer_reviews.title: craftsman what can I say
customer_reviews.text: Have had craftsman hand tools since I was old enough to work on my own vehicles, They has saved me so much time when I couldn't get a socket where I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: LPC

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman is such a great value
customer_reviews.text: These may not have the fine tooth ratcheting the more expensive tool lines have, these are perfectly functional for the home mechanic at a significantly lesser price.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Fulkerson

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: i didnt think I needed these until I bought them. Now I am wondering why and how I completed some jobs without them. Make a lot of automotive tasks easy
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Expected a a bit better quality from Craftsman but would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for Christmas and the one who received this is having a great time with it and enjoys it
customer_reviews.author: spy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Surprisingly good price and the shipping said it was going to take a month, but I got it in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Keith McNaughton

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheap they're not as nice of a product as you would expect from Craftsman
customer_reviews.author: Joel T.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We are alittle rough with our tools. Great addition to our tool box
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: For the money it’s well worth it. I wouldn’t hesitate !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mid grade tools for an average price.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. Bought racks separately. Used wrenches for automotive work from 10 to 18mm and quickly needed a 19mm one and had to buy separately. Flex heads and included racks or case for the price would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: A must have in your tool supply
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Craftsman tools. No garage is complete without a set of these.
customer_reviews.author: Invisible Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these things! They work perfectly and have a smooth ratchet action.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They showed up way faster than expected excellent I don’t know other people are talking about they are awesome
customer_reviews.author: CHEVO M.

customer_reviews.title: Value $pent
customer_reviews.text: Truly the durability rating is based on other craftsman product. So I am a fan
customer_reviews.author: D Wattts

customer_reviews.title: Great looking set of wrenches!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking set! The plastic holder fit nicely in my Craftsman tool box tray. Great tools for the money!
customer_reviews.author: BobS

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool set. Works well and feels very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Weed

customer_reviews.title: Good wrenches
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Haven't used them that much yet, but they should be able to handle everything.
customer_reviews.author: Bbasso

customer_reviews.title: Best tools and best price.
customer_reviews.text: Best tools any person can have in his or her tool chest. Price is unmatched along with fast service and we'll packed. Thank you and god bless.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you need the right tool at the right time, with craftsman's quality, you can't go wrong. These are nice.
customer_reviews.author: ToddyG.

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: Husband hasn’t used them yet but really likes this set.
customer_reviews.author: DeNage Cagle

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: As if right now it is definitely worth the money. If you ever get into a tight spot where you can't get a socket these are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Heavy enough to use as self defense weapons in the larger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use which saves and effort
customer_reviews.text: A very new concept which saves time and effort instead of a socket wrench, also uses less clearance when getting in tight spots
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality for the money!!!! My brother is known for breaking his tools, he uses these daily and they stand up to everything he has thrown at them.
customer_reviews.author: ashley thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: Love these.. second set as my first were ruined by bloody help that left them in the rain then closed the toolbox for a week. :(

customer_reviews.title: great tools
customer_reviews.text: great tools filling up my new shop with only craftsman tools great
customer_reviews.author: anna l.

customer_reviews.title: 5 out of 5 stars ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my husband and he loves them! They are durable and work great 👍 so far so good 😊 they arrived in a timely manner and came well packaged! I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne J

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Only reason for 4 stars is because they came all loose in the box and it looked like it had been returned before but other than that good wrenches

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for your tinkering Tom!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my hubby. He's so proud of them. And he uses them a lot!

customer_reviews.text: These works great. I havent broke any yet. They feel nice

customer_reviews.text: Quality wrenches, the tray they ship in is useless unless you have a tool chest

customer_reviews.title: Dependable and sturdy wrenches
customer_reviews.text: I’m a truck driver so I use my tools on the road it has saved me more than once that’s for sure

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set of wrenches. The type of things you keep for a lifetime.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding value and quality. Makes the times you do have to spin wrenches easier, less knuckle busting.

customer_reviews.title: As a commercial tow truck driver I love it specifically when I pull out the drive line ...
customer_reviews.text: As a commercial tow truck driver I love it specifically when I pull out the drive line and the axles on trucks.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your maintenance needs
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased this set. I've always had good experiences with craftsman tools and this set of wrenches is no different. For the cost it is a great value and would recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like craftsman tools they are quality and the warranty is ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like craftsman tools they are quality and the warranty is the best never have any problems with craftsman tools recommend to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great set of wrenches. you cannot go wrong with Craftsman!

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman Wrenches
customer_reviews.text: Received order very fast. Wrenches are well made and met my expectations. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tony F.

customer_reviews.title: Makes half the wrenches in your tool box obsolete!
customer_reviews.text: The photo does not do these justice. These are quality wrenches. The size of the set is also MUCH larger than I expected. The largest wrenches are a foot long and at an average price of $2.50 per wrench this is a no-brainer. I put them to immediate use and at the end of the job realized that a bunch of other wrenches in my tool box just became obsolete!
customer_reviews.author: Mitzdawg

customer_reviews.title: A good set of ratcheting wrenches and this is it
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. A good set of ratcheting wrenches and this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looks on the finish. Feel comfortable in the hand. The ratchet action works as designed. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: I wish I bought a set sooner!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought a set sooner!!! these are going to be some of my most used tools!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Description wasn't accurate
customer_reviews.text: The description says they there's a 12 degree box offset, but there isn't. They are strait. I prefer the style that has the offset and a lever to switch directions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of ratcheting wrench’s.
customer_reviews.text: Just what you need when you’re in a tight space with little to no wiggle room.

customer_reviews.title: The wrenches came in a nice presentation case which would look better in your ad ...
customer_reviews.text: The wrenches came in a nice presentation case which would look better in your ad than just showing a pile of wrenches.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pieces of tools smooth well constructed but should be in a case

customer_reviews.title: I like them really good quality and they came just in ...
customer_reviews.text: I like them really good quality and they came just in time

customer_reviews.title: Great ratcheting wrench set
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and plated well, so far very strong with a positive ratchet feel, but that what people have always expected of Craftsman tools. I recommend this tool set.
customer_reviews.author: Tim A. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great tools
customer_reviews.text: Great price for great tools. Ratcheting sound not as smooth as something like SnapOn. But DAMN, why spend 4 or 5 time as much to "Sound" better? These have a lifetime guarantee also. So there ya go. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Oberley

customer_reviews.title: Have this set at work (albeit missing a couple pieces) ...
customer_reviews.text: Have this set at work (albeit missing a couple pieces) and they have done every job I have needed them to do

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wrench Set
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Wonderful ratcheting wrenches! Where were these when I was a kid?

customer_reviews.title: but it does come with a flat ratchet end so that you can easily just reverse the side
customer_reviews.text: Wish hit had a switch to switch from tighten to loosen, but it does come with a flat ratchet end so that you can easily just reverse the side. I find myself getting confused sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my husband for Valentine's Day, fast shipping, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Stewart

customer_reviews.title: He was like a kid on Christmas
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY what he wanted. He was like a kid on Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of wrenches for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great set of wrenches for the price. Come in a nice molded tray for each wrench, I used it in my tool box to keep track of them.
customer_reviews.author: N8rsalad

customer_reviews.title: Metric and Standard- wrenches for EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: Just what my boyfriend wanted! He was THRILLED with this set. As a service man he can use the tools for work, and as someone whose hobby is restoring old cars he can use them too.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherT

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, but...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set, but, the 16mm ratchet doesn't turn. Tried to get it going both sides but no go. Didn't want to break it so just left it as is. I'll be cussin somebody if and when I ever need it. Craftsman has been my go to handtools since the early 70's.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and works well
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and works well. I'm completely satisfied with them so far. I know there are cheaper brands out there but I've had some of them fall apart, this is why I still buy Craftsman.
customer_reviews.author: chris c sirignano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for me
customer_reviews.text: My favorite set of wrenches. Specially for the price which none else could beat. Awesome tools. If they break I just take them to SEARS and exchange them.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Delivered on time as promised. Wonderful Christmas gift for my son!

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman Quality.
customer_reviews.text: The quality that you expect from Craftsman is there. I really like these.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Set comes with 10 metric and 10 standard ratcheting wrenches. They are not angled at all, totally straight. They don't come with a bag or anything.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set of wrenches!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic set of wrenches. Love them! Just flip wrench over to switch from tightening to loosening. Super high quality!

product_meta.title: Craftsman 20 Piece Ratcheting Wrench Set, Inch / Metric
product_meta.description: New Craftsman 20pc SAE/Metric Ratcheting Combination Wrench Set # 46820 (Wrenches Only) Contents: _ 10 SAE Wrenches Sizes: 1/4 , 5/16 , 11/32 , 3/8 , 7/16 , 1/2 , 9/16 , 5/8 , 11/16 , 3/4 in _ 10 Metric Wrenches Sizes: 6 , 8 , 10 , 12 , 13 , 14 , 15 , 16 , 17 , 18 mm Full Polish Mirror Finish For Easy Clean 5 Degrees Of Sweep To Move A Fastener Slim Profile For Easy Access To Tight Spaces Factory packaging in pictures is not included to save on shipping cost the tools will properly packaged for shipping Lifetime Warranty from craftsman ................100% money back guarantee
